body.name: L Shaped Desk with Fabric Drawers, 61 Inch Corner Desk with Power Outlets & Movable CPU Stand, Reversible Computer Desk for Home Office, Gaming Desk, Oak Grey
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 18 hrs 19 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Corner Desk with USB Ports】This computer desk is designed with USB Ports, can easily charge phones laptops, gaming gear and other office devices, providing a great convenience to your life when you are working or playing games.

【Large Storage Capacity Desk with Drawers】This L desk is designed with 3 easy to assemble fabric drawers that give a nice amount of storage for everything else you need during your work day or study day. The 3 storage drawers can stash things away. Perfect for placing your documents, office or school supplies, gaming equipment etc. You will always have an organized desktop after owing it.

【Computer Desk with Storage Shelves】This Corner desk with storage allows for an ample storage space, giving you a cleaner looking desk top. Storage Shelves can serve as a 2 tiers bookshelf, but also as a organizer, meet for your different storage needs in home or office. Having the work- from-home desk for your happy life.

【Durable & Sturdy Construction】This home office desk consists of durable waterproof desk boards. The wood is reasonably dense and will not warp or crack over time. The iron frame features lightweight, high strength, and long service life. Adjustable foot pads provide you with a comfortable height for use.

【Easy Assembly & After-sale Service】Our L shaped desk comes with all the necessary tools and instructions, and can be assembled in just 30 minutes. ODK has 24 hours online professional pre or after-sale service for you. Fast refund or replacement for any quality problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Desk, Easy to Assemble and well made!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great desk, love the look and quality. It was easy to assemble and seems very durable. Was surprised about the quality for the price, definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together, just takes a little time. Very sturdy and happy with product. Using for my sewing machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Everything was packaged well protecting the product. Easy to follow instructions will explinations.Solid desk

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a small l shaped table. Make sure to measure your space before purchasing to ensure this is the size you need . I needed a table for my basement office and I thought this was convenient. I like the USB plug and electric plug in. It fit my large monitor, laptop and keyboard. Not a lot of room for anything else unfortunately. As a petite 5’3, the space underneath the desk is pretty spacious . It looks nice and plenty of storage space underneath. Just make sure to be aware of the dimensions before purchasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars [UPDATED] OK desk, low quality manufacturing. Misaligned holes, weak easily warped metal
reviews.reviewText: Update: The seller has good customer service and is responsive. After seeing this review they contacted me to make things right.I'd pay ~$50 to $75 for this desk, but not the $139 that I did. I followed the instructions including small details, double and triple-checking the alignments. The metal bends and warps easily; I alignined all of the pieces with a level, finger-threaded the screws to get everything in place, and then tightened everything. Despite this, the metal pieces twistes and are uneven. When installing the top, I found that the pre-threaded holes in the particle board were roughly 1-3cm off per each hole, causing further tension on the metal and restricting me from tightening the screws for fear of cracking the wood.Maybe I got a manufacturer defect. It's still going to do its job as a desk, but a little overpriced for the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The AODK L Shaped Desk has been a game-changer for my home office. With its 53-inch size and clever design, it fits perfectly into corners, maximizing space. The fabric drawers are a practical addition for keeping things organized, and the inclusion of power outlets and a movable CPU stand adds a level of convenience that I didn't know I needed. The reversible feature gives flexibility in setting up my workspace, making it ideal for both work and gaming. In sleek black, it's not only functional but also adds a modern touch to my home office setup. Overall, a fantastic buy for anyone looking to optimize their workspace at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We needed to downsize a desk space and this was pretty much perfect for the job. Assembly went mostly smoothly. The one thing I got wrong--which the instructions were not clear on at all--was easily noticeable and quickly fixed. The instructions are a weensy-bit deceptive in that they are extremely specific, except when they aren't.Anywho, The only real drawback is that the USB-C/Lightning port built into the desk doesn't carry enough current to charge a laptop. I sort of expected that, and it was confirmed. The desk doesn't turn into a wolf at night either, but I'm not lamenting that absent feature, either.It's light-ish-weight, is sturdy for its size, and makes better use of the space than the 40-something-year-old particle board monstrosity that it replaced. We are happy campers.
